text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You see, I plan to have a race with<n>Teio soon...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I may, I would ask you to attend<n>and witness the outcome.
And,<n>provided you are willing, to continue<n>to look out for
her afterwards.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
True to her word, Rudolf organizes a<n>race with Teio just a
few days later.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the talk of the town, with<n>spectators crowding the
racecourse<n>hours before—no surprise, given the<n>popularity
of both contenders.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whoa, now that's a crowd.Feels like we're in the Twinkle Series!Ahaha! Now I'm all fired up!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh! Hey, look who's here!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Tsk tsk. I am the invincible Teio,remember? So obviously, I'm in peakcondition! I'll crush this race, and the crowd will go wild!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh but... Ah... Never mind, forgot I'm<n>up against Prez today...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Up against Prez, huh...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, um... Nope!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I just, uh... I gotta go get ready! See<n>ya!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At last, the gates fling open as the<n>crowd roars on.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... All right, time to showher what I'm made of!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the race nears the halfway mark,<n>Teio dashes ahead in
an attempt to<n>pass Rudolf, but...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You are not overtaking me!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh c'mon, now I'm even<n>farther behind!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Nnngh, the laststraightaway! No, I'm not done yet!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I said, you are not overtaking me!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wha?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rudolf maintained her dominant lead<n>from start to finish,
leaving Teio to<n>pass the winning post in a distant<n>second.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Guess I lose...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But, well, Prez is just thatincredi—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "Yeahhhh! "

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: President Rudolf, that was incredible!<n>You never disappoint!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Teio's super fast too, but you beat<n>her with such a huge
lead! No wonder<n>they call you the strongest ever!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Prez! Prez! Prez!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: My friends, I thank you for your<n>support.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Th-that's a lot of cheers... All eyes<n>are on her.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And only her...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, um...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I-it's nothing. It's nothing...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Teio turns her back on the frenzied<n>crowd and darts off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I next see her late that night, at the<n>same park by the school.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...
choice_data_list: Little late for a jog, don't you think?
Little late for a jog, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you... Mm, I'm not really in<n>the mood to chat.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Laters. ...Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I run over in a hurry. Close up, I can<n>see her legs
trembling—she's been<n>pushing herself too hard.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hmph! This is nothing, trust me. I<n>gotta get back to running,
so leave me<n>alone!
choice_data_list: You can't keep pushing yourself like this!
You can't keep pushing yourself like this!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: What's it to you, anyway?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Get out of my way! You're not even<n>my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: ...Wh-what's with you?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... What? ...Why do youeven care?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I stay by her side as she cries for a<n>while, offering what
little comfort I can.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Sniffle...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah... But... I still don't understand.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
There's been this... stinging in my<n>chest, ever since the
race.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
It started when I saw Prez getting all<n>those cheers from the
crowd.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It makes no sense, I know. I mean,<n>she's my role model.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
The strongest, the fastest, the most<n>incredible person. The
most deserving<n>of praise from the entire world.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She's everything I could ever dream<n>to be.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Every one of her races that I've gone<n>to, she's won. And
seeing her bask in<n>the crowd's cheers with that smile<n>she
does is the coolest thing ever!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But still, for some reason...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Like, today was no different. I saw<n>her be that perfect
person I've<n>always seen her be.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
So... why do I feel like I have to run to<n>get away from this
feeling? Why does<n>it hurt so much?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Teio seems to be on the verge of an<n>important realization.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But all I can do for now is see her<n>back to her dorm, and
wait.
